Title: Relates to certain crimes committed by a person acting on behalf of a foreign actor
Summary: Provides that acting on behalf of a foreign government shall be an element of certain crimes including coercion in the first degree, kidnapping in the first degree, stalking in the first degree, assault in the first degree, computer trespass, and aggravated harassment in the first degree.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to the commission of certain crimes by persons acting on behalf of a foreign government
